Quartz.note: Most popular for kitchens—durable & low maintenance.

Granite.note: Natural stone—unique patterns, needs occasional sealing.

Laminate.note: Budget-friendly—lots of styles, lower heat resistance.

Porcelain.note: Heat & stain resistant—great for modern looks.

disclaimer: Estimates are rough ranges only and depend on template/measure, material availability, edge profile, seams, access, and sink/appliance specs. Final pricing is confirmed after an on-site measure.
